title: I hate shields
body:
I'm 9/1 twitch and i walk up on a 1/1 diana with jungle item and 2 daggers

i have runaans, a BF sword, and base boots, she shields and it literally takes me 3-4 autos just to take the shield down, then 2 autos almost kill her and i die

can we tone this shit down? if i'm 9/1 i should be able to fart on one player and get a double kill at that point.
